title: LF Clash team: Support Main
body:
Support main looking for a clash team
I'm Tier IV looking for other Tier IV nerds to stomp with
if you're smurfing, hit me up fam, we'll get some free wins
if not, hit me up anyway, only if you're looking for a good support.
I can play anything, so yeah, thanks.

replies.body: damn bro, you good playing from NA in OCE?
